heading: HB07913
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING OWWA OFW CENTERS IN EVERY PROVINCE AND REGION OF THE COUNTRY PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07913
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING OWWA OFW CENTERS IN EVERY PROVINCE AND REGION OF THE COUNTRY PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to establish provincial and regional offices of the OWWA which would act as frontline offices for the OFWs in various regions.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR B.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-09
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Barbers (000 2018-09-18)2. Sangcopan (000 2018-10-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2018-07-30
